å¸®æœ‹å‹åˆ·è¯¾ï¼Œç½‘é¡µç‰ˆè§†é¢‘è¯¾ï¼Œä¸èƒ½æ‹–åŠ¨è¿›åº¦æ¡ï¼Œè¦åˆ· 90 ä¸ªå­¦æ—¶ï¼Œå¤ªå°¼ç›å˜æ€äº†ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æƒ³åˆ°åˆ·è¯¾ã€‚

å‡ ä¸ªæ€è·¯

  • BurpSuite æŠ“åŒ…ç›´æ¥æ”¹ POST æ•°æ®ä½“

ä»¥å‰ç±»ä¼¼çš„éœ€æ±‚æˆ‘éƒ½æ˜¯é€šè¿‡æŠ“åŒ…å·¥å…· BurpSuite æ”¹è§‚çœ‹æ—¶é•¿å˜é‡ï¼Œç„¶åæ”¾åŒ…å®ç°çš„ï¼Œä¹Ÿå±¡è¯•ä¸çˆ½ã€‚ä½†è¿™æ¬¡å‘ç°å¹¶ä¸å¥½ä½¿ã€‚ã€‚æ”¾åŒ…ä¹‹åå»è¯¾ç¨‹é¡µé¢çœ‹äº†ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰ä»»ä½•æ•ˆæœã€‚çœ‹äº†æºç ä¹Ÿå¹¶æ²¡æœ‰ç ”ç©¶æ¸…æ¥šæ˜¯å“ªé‡Œé™åˆ¶äº†ï¼Œæˆ‘éƒ½æ˜¯æŒ‰ç…§ POST æ•°æ®çš„åˆæ³•æ€§æ”¾åŒ…çš„ã€‚

  • åŠ é€Ÿç½‘é¡µè§†é¢‘æ’­æ”¾é€Ÿåº¦

ç”¨æ‰©å±•åŠ é€Ÿè§†é¢‘ï¼Œå‘ç°ä¹Ÿä¸å¥½ä½¿ï¼Œåº”è¯¥ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ js ç¦æ­¢äº†è§†é¢‘åŠ é€Ÿ

  • ç¼–å†™ js è„šæœ¬ /æ²¹çŒ´è„šæœ¬è¦†ç›–åŸ js

çœ‹äº†ä¸‹ç½‘é¡µæºç å‘ç°æ˜¯ js æ§åˆ¶ç¦ç”¨äº†è®¸å¤šåŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œçœ‹æ¥åªæœ‰è‡ªå·±å†™ js è„šæœ¬ override åŸæœ‰è„šæœ¬äº†ï¼Œå¯æƒœæˆ‘ js å¹¶ä¸ç†Ÿã€‚å‰ç«¯å¤§ä½¬ä»¬å¸®å¿™çœ‹ä¸‹ï¼Œæä¾›ä¸ªæ€è·¯ã€‚è°¢è°¢å•¦ï¼Œæˆ‘æŠŠæºç è´´å‡ºæ¥ï¼Œå…³é”®çš„åœ°æ–¹åº”è¯¥ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯é‚£å‡ ä¸ªã€‚è¾›è‹¦è¾›è‹¦å¸ˆå‚…ä»¬

 $(function(){
                        var time         = 0;
                        var is_hls       = "1";
                        var storage      = window.localStorage;
                        var learntime    = 0,player_seek_time = 0,setLearntime = null;
                        var is_drag      = parseInt("0"); // æ§åˆ¶æ‹–åŠ¨è¿›åº¦æ¡ [ 1ï¼šå¯æ‹–åŠ¨ï¼Œ0ï¼šä¸å¯æ‹–åŠ¨] 
                        var content      = "æˆéƒ½ XX ç§‘æŠ€æœ‰é™å…¬å¸æ‰€æœ‰æƒ   ";
                        var learn_record = parseInt("40");

                        if(is_hls == 1){
                        
                        	var myPlayer   = videojs('my-video',{
                                 loop:false,
                                 controlBar: {
                                     LiveDisplay: false,
                                     playbackRateMenuButton:{
                                       //  playbackRates:[0.5,1.0,1.5,2.0,2.5]
                                     }
                                 }
                             },function(){
                                 $("#marquee_content").text(content);
                             });
                             //æ·»åŠ è§†é¢‘å‡†å¤‡å®Œæˆåçš„å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°
                             myPlayer.on('loadedmetadata', function() {
                                
                          
                            	 //è‡ªåŠ¨æ’­æ”¾
                             if(learn_record){
                                     myPlayer.currentTime(learn_record);    //ç»­æ’­
                                     myPlayer.play();
                                     storage.setItem("play_time_155_1722_5091", learn_record);
                                 }
                                 // åˆå§‹åŒ–å®Œæˆæœªæ’­æ”¾æ—¶æ‹–åŠ¨è¿›åº¦
                              if(!is_drag){
                                     var play_time = parseInt(storage.getItem("play_time_155_1722_5091"));
                                     currentTime   = parseInt(myPlayer.currentTime());
                                     if( currentTime-play_time>1 ){
                                         myPlayer.currentTime(play_time);
                                     }
                                 }

                             });
                             //ç›‘å¬è¿›åº¦æ¡æ—¶é—´
                             time = myPlayer.duration();
                             myPlayer.on('timeupdate',videojstimeupdate);
                            
                            
                            
                        }else{
                        	
                        	
                        	
                            var myPlayer = document.getElementById('my-video');
                            //æ·»åŠ è§†é¢‘å‡†å¤‡å®Œæˆåçš„å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°
                            myPlayer.addEventListener('loadedmetadata', function() {
                                                          // è‡ªåŠ¨æ’­æ”¾
                                $("#marquee_content").text(content);     // è·‘é©¬ç¯
               
                            if(learn_record){
                                    myPlayer.currentTime=learn_record;  // ç»­æ’­
                                    myPlayer.play();
                                    storage.setItem("play_time_155_1722_5091", learn_record);
                                    
                                } 
                                // åˆå§‹åŒ–å®Œæˆæœªæ’­æ”¾æ—¶æ‹–åŠ¨è¿›åº¦
                            /*     if(!is_drag){
                                    var play_time = parseInt(storage.getItem("play_time_155_1722_5091"));
                                    currentTime   = parseInt(myPlayer.currentTime);
                                    if( currentTime-play_time>1 ){
                                        myPlayer.currentTime = play_time ;
                                    }
                                } */

                            });
                            
                            
                            
                            
                            //ç›‘å¬è¿›åº¦æ¡æ—¶é—´
                            time = myPlayer.duration;
                            myPlayer.addEventListener('timeupdate',videotimeupdate);
                        }

                        //ç›‘å¬æ’­æ”¾æ—¶é—´
                        function setTime(){
                            learntime = learntime+1;
                           }

                        //æ’­æ”¾
                        function videojsplay() {
                        	
                        	  if(learn_record){
                                  myPlayer.currentTime(learn_record);    //ç»­æ’­
                                  myPlayer.play();
                                  storage.setItem("play_time_155_1722_5091", learn_record);
                              }else{
                            	  
                            	  setLearntime = setInterval(setTime, 1000);
                              }
                        	
                        	 
                          }

                         if(is_hls == 1){
                            myPlayer.on('play', videojsplay);
                            myPlayer.on('pause',videojspause);
                            myPlayer.on('ended', videojsended);
                            //æš‚åœ
                         function videojspause() {
                                clearInterval(setLearntime);
                                var times      = parseInt(myPlayer.currentTime());
                                var total_time = parseInt(myPlayer.duration());
                                if(times > 2){
                                    addLearnLog(times , total_time,1);
                                }
                            }
                            //ç»“æŸ
                            function videojsended() {
                                clearInterval(setLearntime);
                                var times      = parseInt(myPlayer.currentTime());
                                var total_time = parseInt(myPlayer.duration());
                                if(times > 2){
                                    addLearnLog(times , total_time,1);
                                }
                                if( total_time != 0 && times >= total_time ){
                                    // è·å–ä¸‹ä¸€è§£é”è¯¾æ—¶å¹¶è·³è½¬
                                    $.ajax({
                                        type: "POST",
                                        url:"http://xbzj.masterol.cn/index.php?app=course&mod=Video&act=getNextSection",
                                        data:{vid:"155",sid:"1722"},
                                        dataType:"json",
                                        success:function(data){
                                            if(data){
                                                var height = $('#vplayer').height();
                                                var width = $('#vplayer').width();
                                                var index = ui.open({
                                                    type:3,
                                                    icon:2,
                                                    shade: [0.7, '#fff'], //0.1 é€æ˜åº¦çš„ç™½è‰²èƒŒæ™¯
                                                    offset: [height / 2+'px', width / 2+'px'],
                                                });
                                                setTimeout(function(){
                                                    window.location.href = data;
                                                }, 800);
                                            }
                                        }
                                    });
                                }
                            }
                        }else{
                            myPlayer.addEventListener('play',videojsplay);
                            myPlayer.addEventListener('pause',videojspause);
                            myPlayer.addEventListener('ended', videojsended);
                            //æš‚åœ
                            function videojspause() {
                                clearInterval(setLearntime);
                                var times      = parseInt(myPlayer.currentTime);
                                var total_time = parseInt(myPlayer.duration);
                                if(times > 2){
                                    addLearnLog(times , total_time,1);
                                }
                            }
                            //ç»“æŸ
                            function videojsended() {
                                clearInterval(setLearntime);
                                var times      = parseInt(myPlayer.currentTime);
                                var total_time = parseInt(myPlayer.duration);
                                if(times > 2){
                                    addLearnLog(times , total_time,1);
                                }
                                if( total_time != 0 && times >= total_time ){
                                    // è·å–ä¸‹ä¸€è§£é”è¯¾æ—¶å¹¶è·³è½¬
                                    $.ajax({
                                        type: "POST",
                                        url:"http://xbzj.masterol.cn/index.php?app=course&mod=Video&act=getNextSection",
                                        data:{vid:"155",sid:"1722"},
                                        dataType:"json",
                                        success:function(data){
                                            if(data){
                                                var height = $('#vplayer').height();
                                                var width = $('#vplayer').width();
                                                var index = ui.open({
                                                    type:3,
                                                    icon:2,
                                                    shade: [0.7, '#fff'], //0.1 é€æ˜åº¦çš„ç™½è‰²èƒŒæ™¯
                                                    offset: [height / 2+'px', width / 2+'px'],
                                                });
                                                setTimeout(function(){
                                                    window.location.href = data;
                                                }, 800);
                                            }
                                        }
                                    });
                                }
                            }
                        }

                     
                  
                            
                         if(!is_drag){
                            var play_time = parseInt(storage.getItem("play_time_155_1722_5091"));

                             if(curr_times-times>1){
                        	    console.log('1307'+curr_times+'-'+play_time+'--'+times);
                        	    myPlayer.currentTime(play_time);
                        	    storage.setItem("play_time_155_1722_5091", play_time);
                               }   
        
                            }
                            
       
                            if( total_time != 0 && curr_times >= total_time ){
                                // è·å–ä¸‹ä¸€è§£é”è¯¾æ—¶å¹¶è·³è½¬
                                $.ajax({
                                    type: "POST",
                                    url:"http://xbzj.masterol.cn/index.php?app=course&mod=Video&act=getNextSection",
                                    data:{vid:"155",sid:"1722"},
                                    dataType:"json",
                                    success:function(data){
                                        if(data){
                                            var height = $('#vplayer').height();
                                            var width = $('#vplayer').width();
                                            var index = ui.open({
                                                type:3,
                                                icon:2,
                                                shade: [0.7, '#fff'], //0.1 é€æ˜åº¦çš„ç™½è‰²èƒŒæ™¯
                                                offset: [height / 2+'px', width / 2+'px'],
                                            });
                                            setTimeout(function(){
                                                window.location.href = data;
                                            }, 800);
                                        }
                                    }
                                });
                            }

                            if( times     != parseInt(myPlayer.currentTime()) ){
                                times      = parseInt(myPlayer.currentTime());
                                if(times > 0 && times % 4 == 0 ){
                                    addLearnLog(times , total_time , 0);  //0 è¡¨ç¤ºä¸åŠæ—¶æ›´æ–°å­¦ä¹ è®°å½•ï¼Œå³ 4 ç§’ä¸€æ¬¡
                                }
                                storage.setItem( 'learn_curr_time', times);
                            }

                            if(is_free == 0 && free == 0){
                                if (times > test_time){
                                    myPlayer.pause();
                                    $("#vplayer").html('');
                                    $(".vedioPlay-msg").css("display","block");
                                }
                            }
                        }

                        //video æ—¶é—´æ›´æ–°
                        function videotimeupdate() {
                            var test_time  = 5;
                            var is_free    = 1;//è¯¾ç¨‹æ˜¯å¦å…è´¹
                         var free       = 0;//è¯¾æ—¶æ˜¯å¦å…è´¹

                         var total_time = parseInt(myPlayer.duration);
                            var times      = storage.getItem('learn_curr_time');
                            var curr_times = parseInt(myPlayer.currentTime);

                            // æ‹–åŠ¨è¿›åº¦
                            if(!is_drag){
                                var play_time = parseInt(storage.getItem("play_time_155_1722_5091"));

                                 if(curr_times-times>1){
                            	    console.log('1307'+curr_times+'-'+play_time+'--'+times);
                            	    myPlayer.currentTime = play_time;
                            	    storage.setItem("play_time_155_1722_5091", play_time);
                                   }   
            
                                }

                            if( total_time != 0 && curr_times >= total_time ){
                                // è·å–ä¸‹ä¸€è§£é”è¯¾æ—¶å¹¶è·³è½¬
                                $.ajax({
                                    type: "POST",
                                    url:"http://xbzj.masterol.cn/index.php?app=course&mod=Video&act=getNextSection",
                                    data:{vid:"155",sid:"1722"},
                                    dataType:"json",
                                    success:function(data){
                                        if(data){
                                            var height = $('#vplayer').height();
                                            var width = $('#vplayer').width();
                                            var index = ui.open({
                                                type:3,
                                                icon:2,
                                                shade: [0.7, '#fff'], //0.1 é€æ˜åº¦çš„ç™½è‰²èƒŒæ™¯
                                                offset: [height / 2+'px', width / 2+'px'],
                                            });
                                            setTimeout(function(){
                                                window.location.href = data;
                                            }, 800);
                                        }
                                    }
                                });
                            }

                            if( times     != parseInt(myPlayer.currentTime) ){
                                times      = parseInt(myPlayer.currentTime);
                                if(times > 0 && times % 4 == 0 ){
                                    addLearnLog(times , total_time , 0);  //0 è¡¨ç¤ºä¸åŠæ—¶æ›´æ–°å­¦ä¹ è®°å½•ï¼Œå³ 4 ç§’ä¸€æ¬¡
                                }
                                storage.setItem( 'learn_curr_time', times);
                            }

                            if(is_free == 0 && free == 0){
                                if (times > test_time){
                                    myPlayer.pause();
                                    $("#vplayer").html('');
                                    $(".vedioPlay-msg").css("display","block");
                                }
                            }
                        }

                        //æ·»åŠ è§‚çœ‹è®°å½•
                        function addLearnLog(timespan , total_time , is_true){
                            var t          = parseInt(timespan);
                            var total_time = parseInt(total_time);
                            var video_type = "5";

                            if((t && (t % 4 == 0)) || is_true == 1){

                                $.ajax({
                                    type: "POST",
                                    url:"http://xbzj.masterol.cn/index.php?app=course&mod=Video&act=updateLearn",
                                    data:{time:t,player_seek_time:learntime,vid:"155",sid:"1722",totaltime:total_time,is_true:is_true,type:video_type},
                                    dataType:"json",
                                    success:function(data){
                                    	
                                      if(data.status=='0'){
                                       	    console.log('ä¿®æ­£--'+t+'-'+data.time);
                                       	    
                                       	   if(is_hls == 1){
                                       		  myPlayer.currentTime(data.time);	
                                       	    }else{
                                       	      myPlayer.currentTime = data.time;
                                       	    }
                                       	    storage.setItem("play_time_155_1722_5091", data.time);
                                            ui.error('ç¦æ­¢å¤šæ¬¡æ‹–åŠ¨å¿«è¿›ï¼');
                                            return;
                                       }else if(data.status=='-1'){
                                       	
                                       	    ui.error('æ‚¨çš„ç™»å½•å·²è¿‡æœŸï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°ç™»å½•');
                                       	    var callbacklogin = "location.href ='/login.html'";
                                            setTimeout(callbacklogin,3000);
                                            return false;
                                       }else{
                                       	
                                       	
                                       }
                                    }
                                });

                            }
                        }
                    });
